system.notes: Only Acquirable by Tech Priests. Draws Power from the Potentia Coil, and so does not run out of energy. Has Inbuilt Photo-Visor and Respirator. Increases Strength Characteristic by +10. User must have Cyber Mantle and Potentia Coil.
